data.title: Aaron Ramsey: My most talented team
data.meta_description: Aaron Ramsey risked alienating the Arsenal dressing room after naming Gareth Bale as his most talented team-mate.
data.text:
Aaron Ramsey: My most talented team-mate… doesn’t play for Arsenal

ByEurosport

Published 30/03/2016 at 09:06 GMT

Aaron Ramsey risked alienating the Arsenal dressing room after naming Gareth Bale as his most talented team-mate.

Aaron Ramsey celebrates scoring the opening goal for Arsenal against Tottenham

Image credit: Reuters

In a quickfire interview with Goal.com, the midfielder snubbed the likes of Mesut Ozil and Alexis Sanchez in favour of his Welsh counterpart.

Hector Bellerin – – has extra reason to be riled, after Ramsey suggested Theo Walcott was the quickest Gunner over 100m.

Ramsey also revealed his childhood idol (Graham Kavanagh), favourite goal (FA Cup final winner in 2014) and his toughest opponent (Scott Parker).
